capabilities.code_generation: Turns natural-language prompts into compilable source code
capabilities.debugging: Helps identify and fix bugs in code
capabilities.refactoring: Restructures existing code without changing functionality
capabilities.test_synthesis: Generates test cases and test code
capabilities.project_context: Understands entire codebase context and relationships
capabilities.architecture_design: Helps design system architecture and patterns
capabilities.codebase_context: Maintains context about the entire project structure
